name: DWARF Workshop Management Systems
description:
I had an itch and only more Text Mode would scratch it!

This is a prototype textmode ui desktop resource management "game".  Current mechanics is to send out your dwarves to find artifacts, bring them back, research them to increase their value, and sell them at the market so that you can make enough to pay for your dwarves salaries at the next payday.

The event log is missing so you really need to use your imagination for what the dwarves are doing.  I'm very happy with what I got done in a weeks worth of weekday evenings.  This has pretty thoroughly scratched my itch so I don't know how much more I'll add to the prototype.
